meta.job_title: Home Study and Post Release Services Caseworker (HS and PRS Caseworker) Level 2

duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct in-person home visits with children released from federal care to their sponsor to promote safety and stabilization and assess risk and protective factors.
Develop individualized strength-based goal-oriented service plans and coordinate referrals and address barriers in relevant service need areas such as legal, education, medical, mental health.
Provide psychoeducation to children and sponsor on relevant topics, and monitor progress of goal completion.

Serve as a mandated reporter, network and develop partnerships within the community to educate providers on children’s needs, and write case notes; enter data; complete reports in a time-sensitive manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in social work (BSW) or an equivalent degree in education, psychology, sociology, or other behavioral science required. MSW Preferred.
